items.sentence: Tom started to say something, but Mary stopped him.
Tom started to say something, but changed his mind.
Tom stopped by occasionally to fix things for Mary.
Where do you think you\'ll be three years from now?
Mary wore a blue dress to Tom and Alice\'s wedding.
Do you think we\'ll make it to the station in time?
Tom and I had a long talk the night before he died.
Tom and I have decided to go to Boston next summer.
Tom and John both said they were in love with Mary.
Tom and Mary are currently working on that problem.
